name: Mr Hit
description:
Crash! Slam! Bam! Wow! That was a good one! Great job! This is Mr Hit, and it’s the craziest fighting adventure game yet!

In Mr Hit, you take on wave after wave of enemies as you try to reach the finish. Use your weapon to slap, bang, and wallop your adversary into submission. Did it? Great! Proceed and claim your prize...another awesome level!

Features:

- Packed with awesome weapons: bats, meats, candlesticks, and more
- Amazing levels to try
- Lots of fun challenges to keep you busy
